data.headline: Senior UX Designer
data.summary: Experienced UX Designer with a proven track record of delivering user-centric solutions that drive business growth. Skilled in research, prototyping, and iterative design, with a passion for creating intuitive and engaging digital experiences.

experience.title: Senior UX Designer
experience.paragraph: As the lead UX Designer at Startup XYZ, I drove the design of a cutting-edge mobile app that streamlined the process of finding and booking local service providers. Through user research, I identified key pain points and developed innovative solutions that increased user engagement by 35% and reduced customer churn by 20% within the first 6 months of launch.

experience.title: UX Designer
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design user-friendly interfaces for a variety of clients, including e-commerce platforms and enterprise software
Conducted user research and usability testing to inform design decisions, resulting in a 25% increase in customer satisfaction
Implemented a design system that improved workflow efficiency and reduced development time by 30%

experience.title: UX Intern
bullets: Participated in user research and persona development to understand target audience needs
Designed wireframes and prototypes for new product features, which were implemented and resulted in a 15% increase in user retention

projects.name: UX Redesign of Company Website
projects.description: Conducted user research, redesigned the information architecture, and improved the overall user experience, resulting in a 20% increase in website conversions.

projects.name: Mobile App for Local Service Booking
projects.description: Designed the user interface and user flow for a mobile app that streamlined the process of finding and booking local service providers, leading to a 35% increase in user engagement and a 20% reduction in customer churn.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Lena Müller, a senior UX Designer, looking confident and approachable in a well-lit, neutral background.
